nodes.text: Carrandar Secundus was a location where the Galactic Empire destroyed a slaver's nest around five years before the Battle of Yavin. News about the nest's destruction was published and Merei Spanjaf, a young Human living on the planet Lothal, read about the destruction on her datapad's newsfeed.
Carrandar Secundus was first mentioned in Servants of the Empire: Rebel in the Ranks, a novel written by Jason Fry and published in 2015.
